description: Surrogate unique identifier for this migration rule row, used as the primary key.
Numeric stage of the migration workflow used to group and sequence related operations; confirm exact semantics with SME.
Decimal sort position controlling execution order within the phase; likely an intra‑phase sequence. Confirm with SME.
Name of the target table affected by this migration step (destination entity).
Stored SQL FROM/WHERE clause defining source tables and filters for this step’s data extraction; used to assemble SELECT queries.
Boolean flag indicating this step uses fixed/constant values instead of sourcing from data.
Boolean flag indicating the operation updates existing records rather than inserting new ones.
Boolean flag indicating the source query applies DISTINCT to eliminate duplicate rows.
Identifier of the user account that created this configuration entry.
Timestamp when this configuration entry was created.
Identifier of the user account that last updated this configuration entry.
Timestamp of the most recent update to this configuration entry.
